physical.title: 60s Desk Stretches
physical.description: Simple neck and shoulder stretches you can do while seated. (Feel free to watch video if you are unsure of some stretches.)

physical.title: 5‑Min Quick Walk
physical.description: Step away for a brisk 5-minute walk to reset your posture and focus.

physical.title: 20‑Min Desk Yoga
physical.description: A quick 20-minute desk yoga session to stretch and rejuvenate your body.

physical.title: 3‑Min Posture Check
physical.description: A brief posture check and adjustment routine to improve alignment and reduce tension.

physical.title: 2‑Min Eye Relaxation
physical.description: A simple eye relaxation exercise to reduce eye strain from screen time.

mental.title: 5‑Min Guided Breathing
mental.description: Short 5-minute breathing meditation to calm your mind.

mental.title: Simple Mindful Breathing
mental.description: Easy, minimal breathing exercise to reconnect with your breath.

mental.title: Heart Breathing Exercise
mental.description: A calming heart‑centered breathing exercise for focus and self‑connection.

mental.title: 3‑Min Box Breathing
mental.description: A quick 3‑minute box breathing exercise to reduce stress.

cognitive.title: 2‑Min Wordle Challenge
cognitive.description: A short short game of wordle to refresh attention (no video).

cognitive.title: Quick Trivia Challenge
cognitive.description: A short trivia game to stimulate your brain.

cognitive.title: 5‑Min Sudoku Puzzle
cognitive.description: A quick Sudoku puzzle to engage your mind (no video).

cognitive.title: 3-Min Drawing Activity
cognitive.description: A relaxing digital drawing activity to refresh your mind.

social.title: 1‑Min Coworker Check‑In
social.description: Send a quick message or emoji to someone — just a moment of connection.

social.title: 5‑Min Get to Know You Scheduling
social.description: Take a moment to schedule a brief chat with a colleague or friend to strengthen your connection.

social.title: 3‑Min Calendar Review
social.description: View your calendar and identify/review your plans for the upcoming week.

social.title: 2‑Min Gratitude Reflection
social.description: Reflect on and jot down things you are grateful for in your social and work life.

social.title: 3‑Min News Check‑In
social.description: Scroll through the news and see what is going on today.
